extensionDescription.message: Quickly add, delete, or archive bookmarks in Raindrop

welcomeDescription.message: Let's set up the extension to work with your Raindrop account.

welcomeTabsPermissionSectionTitle.message: Step 1: Permission to access your tabs
welcomeTabsPermissionSectionTitle.description: Title of the section explaining the tabs permission.

welcomeTabsPermissionSectionDescription.message: This extension needs permission to access your tabs to be able to display whether a tab is bookmarked in your Raindrop account.
welcomeTabsPermissionSectionDescription.description: Description of the tabs permission section.

welcomeTabsPermissionActionButton.description: Button text to grant tabs permission.

welcomeRaindropPermissionSectionTitle.description: Title of the section explaining the Raindrop permission.

welcomeRaindropPermissionActionButton.description: Button text to log in to Raindrop.

welcomeSettingsSectionTitle.message: Step 3: Choose what to do when removing a bookmark
welcomeSettingsSectionTitle.description: Title of the section explaining the settings.

welcomeSettingsRemoveLabel.message: Where should bookmarks go when removed?
welcomeSettingsRemoveLabel.description: Label for the setting that allows the user to choose what happens when a bookmark is removed.

welcomeSettingsRemoveToTrash.description: Option to delete a bookmark, sending it to the trash.

welcomeCloseButton.description: Button text to close the welcome page.

authenticationErrorDescription.message: There was an error while trying to authenticate with Raindrop. Please try again later.
authenticationErrorDescription.description: Description shown when there is an authentication error.

commandDescription.message: Add or remove the current page from Raindrop
commandDescription.description: Description of the command that adds or removes the current page from Raindrop.

pageActionNotAuthorized.message: Log in to this extension via Raindrop.
pageActionNotAuthorized.description: Message shown when the user has not authorized the extension.

pageActionPending.description: Message shown when the extension is waiting for a response from the Raindrop API.

pageActionAddBookmark.description: Button text for adding a bookmark.

pageActionRemoveBookmark.description: Button text for removing a bookmark.

pageActionApiError.message: Encountered an error while communicating with Raindrop
pageActionApiError.description: Message shown when there was an API communication error with Raindrop

menuOptions.description: Text for the context menu item that opens the options page.

optionsRequireInitialSetup.message: You need to complete the initial setup before using the extension.
optionsRequireInitialSetup.description: Message shown in options when the initial setup is not completed.

optionsOpenSetup.description: Button text to open the setup page from options.
